pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal Subset Identification in Undirected Weighted Network Models // Identifies what optimal subset of a desired number of items should be retained in a short version of a psychometric instrument to assess the broadest proportion of the construct- level content of the set of items included in the original version of the said psychometric instrument. Expects a symmetric adjacency matrix as input (undirected weighted network model). Supports brute force and simulated annealing combinatorial search algorithms.
